content: wrist rest materials yarn joann s big twist yarn hook 5mm pattern abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch decrease = decrease how to decrease insert hook into next stitch yarn over and pull through then insert hook into next stitch yarn over and pull through finally yarn over and pull through all three loops on the hook pattern round pictures round 1 chain 2 10 single_crochet into 1st chain round 2 2 single_crochet into each st around 20 single_crochet round 3 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around if you have big wrists and you need a thinner wrist rest stop here and go to round 5 if you have smaller wrists like me go to round 4 30 single_crochet round 4 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around 40 single_crochet round 5- length of your keyboard minus an inch single_crochet in each st around ending round 1 if you did round 4 otherwise see ending round 2 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease around 30 single_crochet if you need a reminder of how to do a decrease see materials page above ending round 2 stuff your wrist rest you ll want it to be pretty firmly stuffed for good support single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease around 20 single_crochet ending round 3 2 single_crochet decrease around 10 single_crochet fasten_off and leave a long tail to sew the end together congratulations you ve made a keyboard wrist rest may your wrists never ache again
